name: Sunrise Park
description: “Dagot ́ee” - Welcome to Sunrise Park Resort! Owned and operated by the White Mountain Apache Tribe, nestled in the beautiful White Mountains of Eastern Arizona. Over 800 skiable acres, 3 peaks, elevations reaching 11,100’ with 1,800’ vert. Average snowfall 250” annually, with 8-12% moisture content produces light, fluffy, blissful pow! We also have state of the art snowmaking. Expertly groomed and natural terrain, something for everyone: first timers, terrain park fiends, experts and adaptive. Try our ski bikes, tubing hill and snow cat tours!
